Process\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goals of internal audit are to minimize risks and to cut costs for the Company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internal audit implies systematic inspection of meeting QMS requirements along with external standards (ISO 9001, ISAE 3402, ISO 27001, CMMI) to detect potential problems and to find areas for improvement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Audits are conducted by internal auditors -  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMKPAL\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Assurance Group\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in accordance with audit plan which includes project audits and department audits (IT, HR, TA, CDP) . Audits are maintained and monitored on a special AUDIT_Board in JIRA.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Conducting of audits includes documentation review and interviews of the project members. Planning, control, analysis documentation steps and the result records are subject to internal audits.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The mandatory set of project documents to be
